title: How can I display my NFT certificate online?
text: You will get two versions. One stamped with the mention 'harmonia-eko', the other without. All your certificate informations will be visible in the NFT metadata (and thus in your wallet and our html embed, WiP).You can download and use the images freely. They are yours.

title: Do your NFTs have rarity traits or anything I should know?
text: No, but such a system will be rolled out progressively. HOWEVER, each NFT is only available for ONE month only, you get one per purchase. Also, special NFTs will be offered during promotion events. Stay tuned.

title: What is ħ?
text: ħ (HBAR) is the currency we use to support our NFTs. It is based on the carbon negative Hedera blokchain network.

title: What are the marketplace fees?
text: All prices include a 4% fee for the payment processors and harmonia-eko.
